title: And Just Like That....Episode 4 Review - "Some of My Best Friends"
itunes:title: And Just Like That....Episode 4 Review - "Some of My Best Friends"
itunes:subtitle: We're a bit at a loss for words
description:
Though we're on a break from our regular content, we're still releasing our weekly reviews of "And Just Like That" and of course this week we had to cover EVERYTHING, from Charlotte's weird storyline of having too many "Vanilla" friends and her need for LTW to love her, to Carrie (sorry, we meant Caroline) and Sima's developing relationship. Is And Just Like That doing the most with their overtly cringe discussions on race? Has the show potentially lost its charm? And do we agree with how Stanford was written out of the show? Join us this week as we go down the rabbit hole on all things for the new episode of the Sex and the City reboot!



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
